Day 30
Someone who prays in reverence
A person is praying in a mosque
A young man prays properly in the mosque
An old man prays in the mosque
Pray, my friend, charity for charity
Don\t you see the beauty of the picture,
Come on my friend, it\s the prayer
God wants good for us, let\s go
Perhaps it is good, we do not know
Three old men are praying
Hurry up and prepare yourself to apply
Opportunities are available
Arrange your thoughts
Perhaps today you will be lucky to find your dream job
Get outside
You may want to go out for a number of reasons
Go out for a coffee or get some fresh air
Come on, it\s time to get out
It\s time to record a video for your page
Come on, formulate an idea and implement it
Now that you have a good studio
You have the advantage in what you do
Relax while watching a movie
Prepare the place
Prepare your breakfast and food
Come on, prepare popcorn
Start by identifying your weaknesses
Come on, review, maybe learn something new
Do not do anything that bothers you
Rest and relax
Someone who prays in reverence, you can do the same, just remember that God is merciful
A person is praying in a mosque, and the view is beautiful. The shape of the lighting from the window crosses to shed light on him
A young man prays properly in the mosque. Imagine his humility in the place. You need that feeling
An old man prays in the mosque. You can imitate him. Look at him praying in reverence
Pray, my friend, charity for charity, you may want to pray, but you don\t know what you want
Don\t you see the beauty of the picture, from the picture you feel reverence. Come on, my friend, let\s be in Gods hands
Come on my friend, it\s the prayer, maybe God wants you success in the next step
God wants good for us, let\s go, we need him and we need his love to be human

Perhaps it is good, we do not know, your confession that you are weak because you need God is the beginning of your faith in God, but you have to continue as if you have all the powers in the world because you believe that God is with you, so who is against you
Three old men are praying, and this means that there is nothing too old for his prayer. Whatever you are, you can return to God
Hurry up and prepare yourself to apply. Jobs in your field are available. You only need to search continuously
Opportunities are available, but you need to search for them, so come on, trust in yourself. You have been working hard for a long time to make money
Arrange your thoughts and come on, try to find a good job opportunity in your field that you can, thanks to God
Perhaps today you will be lucky to find your dream job. You can, God willing. I am tired. Come on, it is a simple extra effort that you can do to succeed.
Get outside, don\t wait, get outside and get some fresh air
You may want to go out for a number of reasons, so take a break from what you\re doing and get out
Go out for a coffee or get some fresh air and focus on what you\re doing
Come on, it\s time to get out. Roll outside, huh
It\s time to record a video for your page. Come on, no one succeeded without getting tired, and you also want to try the new device in the montage
Come on, formulate an idea and implement it. Do not wait for tomorrow. Perhaps tomorrow will not come unless you go to it
Now that you have a good studio, you can appear in photography with a better appearance and record videos for your channel in a good mood
You have the advantage in what you do. Remember that you have several things together. Come on, encourage and do what you can. You are supernatural only with your mind.
Relax while watching a movie, choose the appropriate movie and enjoy your time
Prepare the place and maybe you can invite some of your friends to watch a movie together
Prepare your breakfast and food, choose your favorite movie, and enjoy your time. It\s movie night
Come on, prepare popcorn, maybe you can watch a movie in a cinema or at home as you prefer
Start by identifying your weaknesses and strengths in your field of work, strengthen yourself, learn about the labor market, and other things that include your needs.
Come on, review, maybe learn something new, maybe you can benefit from something, you can make an application, come on, never stop
Do not do anything that bothers you. Try to go to quiet places and sit alone. It is not an expression of sadness, but an attempt to understand yourself.
Rest and relax, perhaps this will give you an advantage. To start quickly, you need to rest first, in order to maintain your fast launch as long as possible.
